short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make tracking time easy and painless with automated tracking, reminders, and reports.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tracker is a simple extension that tracks how much time you spend on each of your projects.

Every 15 minutes, a popup will ask what you worked on for the last 15 minutes. At the end of the week, generate a report summarizing how long you worked on each project.

For support and feedback, send an email to chargetrackerapp@gmail.com
